result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shane T Lozano

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 28, 2022 at 09:15 am.

9:02 AM Defendant Shane T Lozano in court.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew W Kline in court for the State of Wisconsin. DAR Court Reporter: Taryn Strickland. 
Deft has not hired an atty yet.
Deft did not qualify for SPD representation.
Deft just started work again a month ago and needs more time to come up with the money to hire an atty.
Court reviews the Deft's Petition for an atty again.
Court cannot grant an appointment of an atty due to the deft's total income.
State puts their offer on the record.
Deft indicates that was not the offer he remembered.
BTC: Matter adjourned for deft to figure out what he wants to do.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: No contact with the victim R.P (person, property, residence or family). Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Current: 3200 Kinzie Ave, Racine, WI 53405 United States  (Effective: 08-22-2022)
Prior: 1607 Russet St, Racine, WI 53405

State indicates they looked into the case further and indicates we could address bond today if the Court wanted to.
Deft does not qualify for SPD representation.
Deft has not tried to hire an atty on his own.
Court appointed atty info is given to the deft.
Court goes off the record to allow the deft to fill out the form.
BACK ON THE RECORD 11:14AM.
All appearances remain the same.
Deft has filled out the Petition for a court appointed atty.
BTC: Court appointed atty is denied.
State objects to any bond modification.
BTC: Modify bond in case 22CM846 to a $1000 signature bond, all conditions remain, matters adjourned.
